steps: Crack eggs in a bowl, add chopped tomato, onion, and green chili.
Whisk well with salt.
Pour into a hot greased pan and cook until set.
Serve hot with toast.
Peel and cube potatoes, slice onions.
Heat oil, sauté onions until golden.
Add potatoes, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt.
Cook on medium heat until crispy.
Chop onions, tomatoes, and garlic.
Heat oil, sauté garlic and onion until soft.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and salt.
Cook until the curry thickens.
Chop onion, tomato, and green chili.
Heat oil, sauté onions, then tomatoes until soft.
Add beaten eggs, scramble until cooked.
Serve hot.
Boil, peel, and cube potatoes.
Heat oil, sauté onions until golden.
Add potatoes, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt.
Mix well and cook for 5 mins.
Boil yellow dal with turmeric and salt.
In another pan, sauté garlic, onions, and tomatoes.
Mix with dal and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.
Boil and peel eggs and potatoes.
Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes with spices.
Add eggs and potatoes, simmer for 10 mins.
Serve with roti or rice.
Cook rice separately.
Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes with turmeric.
Mix cooked rice and stir fry for 5 mins.
Serve hot.
Slice onions into rings.
Prepare a batter with egg, flour, salt, and chili powder.
Dip onions, deep fry until crispy.
Serve with ketchup.
Boil and peel eggs.
Sauté garlic, onions, and tomatoes with turmeric.
Add eggs, cook for 10 mins.
Serve hot with rice.
Cut potatoes into wedges.
Toss with chili powder, garlic paste, and salt.
Bake or fry until golden.
Cook rice separately.
Sauté onions, garlic, and peas, add beaten egg and scramble.
Mix rice and stir-fry for 5 mins.
Serve hot.
Chop onions, garlic, and green chili.
Sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add beaten eggs, scramble and serve.
Mix chopped onion, tomato, egg, and salt.
Spread on bread slices.
Toast on a tawa until golden and serve.
Boil and mash potatoes.
Sauté onion and garlic, add beaten eggs, scramble.
Mix potatoes and spices, cook for 5 mins.
Serve hot.
Chop onion and tomato finely.
Mix with egg, salt, and turmeric.
Cook as omelette in hot pan.
Thinly slice potatoes.
Deep fry until golden, toss with salt and chili powder.
Serve as snack.
Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato in butter.
Add water, boil and blend.
Season and serve hot.
Boil eggs, chop onions and chilies.
Sauté onions and chilies, add eggs and spices.
Cook for 5 mins, serve hot.
Slice potatoes and onions thinly.
Prepare batter with gram flour, salt, and chili powder.
Dip and deep fry until crispy.
